place.name: BEESBY IN THE MARSH
place.gazetteerText: BEESBY-IN-THE-MARSH, a parish in Louth district, Lincoln; 3 miles NNE of Alford r. station. Post Town, Alford. Acres, 1,1 80. Real property, £1,822- Pop., 174. Houses, 34. The property is divided among a few. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £207. Patron, Rev. H. P. Mason. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
